channel.title: Barack Obama on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Barack Obama on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: What Summer Camp Is Like for the Kids of the Hollywood Elite
item.description: Out: s’mores, Color war and Bug Juice. In: Haute Cuisine Foodstations and Olympic-sized arenas at amenity-packed, culturally sensitive New England compounds. Having fun yet?

item.title: White House Calls ‘The View’s’ Joy Behar an “Irrelevant Loser” After She Says Trump’s “Jealous of Obama”
item.description: Behar’s comments came after Trump accused his predecessor, Obama, of “treason” and trying to rig the 2016 and 2020 elections.
